name: ADT_SPLIT_ACCT_INTERP_HX
description: The ADT_SPLIT_ACCT_INTERP_HX table extracts the history of the reporting interpretations of the Encounter Series billing items for ADT events. This table contains a foreign key to the CLARITY_ADT table for linking to other ADT tables.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: START_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The starting instant for this interpretation.

columns.name: END_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The ending instant for this interpretation.

columns.name: OUTGOING_FIN_CLASS_EVENT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The event type interpretation category for outgoing events for financial class.

columns.name: INCOMING_FIN_CLASS_EVENT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The event type interpretation category for incoming events for financial class.

columns.name: FROM_FINANCIAL_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number of the financial class that the patient had prior to the event.
entries: Sent to Consolidated Self-Pay Service Area

columns.name: TO_FINANCIAL_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number of the financial class that the patient had after the event.

columns.name: OUTGOING_PAYER_EVENT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The event type interpretation category for outgoing events for the payer.

columns.name: INCOMING_PAYER_EVENT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The event type interpretation category for incoming events for the payer.

columns.name: OUTGOING_PLAN_EVENT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The event type interpretation category for outgoing events for the plan.

columns.name: INCOMING_PLAN_EVENT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The event type interpretation category for incoming events for the plan.

columns.name: FROM_PLAN_ID_BEN_PACKAGE_NAME
columns.description: *** Deprecated *** In table CLARITY_EPP_OT, the column BEN_PACKAGE_NAME (CMK .2) has been deprecated.  This column already exists as BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM (CMK .2) in table CL_CMK. To look up the deprecated column's value after the Clarity Compass upgrade, join column CLARITY_EPP_OT.BEN_PACKAGE_ID to table CL_CMK column BENEFIT_PACKAGE_ID and get the BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM value.   The name of the benefit package for this benefit plan.The ID of the benefit package is in the column BEN_PACKAGE_ID.

columns.name: TO_PLAN_ID_BEN_PACKAGE_NAME
columns.description: *** Deprecated *** In table CLARITY_EPP_OT, the column BEN_PACKAGE_NAME (CMK .2) has been deprecated.  This column already exists as BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM (CMK .2) in table CL_CMK. To look up the deprecated column's value after the Clarity Compass upgrade, join column CLARITY_EPP_OT.BEN_PACKAGE_ID to table CL_CMK column BENEFIT_PACKAGE_ID and get the BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM value.   The name of the benefit package for this benefit plan.The ID of the benefit package is in the column BEN_PACKAGE_ID.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_ENC_EVENT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the event prior to this line's event ID.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account that was active during this line in the interpretation history. This column is frequently used to link to the HSP_ACCOUNT table.
